input.sentences: we started the night out at a local bar .
everyone was enjoying drinks and having fun .
we ventured outside and the streets were packed .
at nighttime the crowd began to disburse .
we went back to the local bar to end the night with another drink .
output.sentences: We started the night at a local dive bar.
We had fun enjoying various alcoholic drinks.
We ventured through the streets that were packed with people.
Nightime will disburse and the crowd will disappear.
We then ended the night at a local bar, having a drink.
